# Framework Documentation - LLM Navigation Index

Core framework patterns for building services in the {{PROJECT_NAME}} platform.

## Documents in This Folder (5 files)

| Document | Purpose | Load When |
|----------|---------|-----------|
| **README.md** | Framework index and task-to-spec mapping | Starting any development task (entry point) |
| **go-generation-guide.md** | Mandatory Go code patterns, idioms, and conventions | Writing any Go code |
| **typescript-ui-guide.md** | Mandatory frontend patterns: components, accessibility, performance | Writing any frontend/UI code |
| **performance-guide.md** | Mandatory performance standards: memory, profiling, latency, code quality | Performance-sensitive work |
| **testing-guide.md** | Unit/integration tests, fixtures, mocking strategies | Writing tests |

## Quick Reference: Common Patterns

### Repository Pattern
```go
type Repository[T any] interface {
    Get(ctx context.Context, tenantID, id string) (*T, error)
    List(ctx context.Context, tenantID string, query ListQuery) ([]*T, string, error)
    Create(ctx context.Context, entity *T) (*T, error)
    Update(ctx context.Context, entity *T) (*T, error)
    Delete(ctx context.Context, tenantID, id string) error
}
```

- `go-generation-guide.md`, `typescript-ui-guide.md`

### Performance & Quality

- `testing-guide.md`
